title: Video: Superorganism – Something For Your M.I.N.D.
body:
Technically a re-release of sorts.

After appearing online earlier this year, followed by co-signs from Frank Ocean and Ezra Koenig, **Superorganism’s** debut track, _Something For Your M.I.N.D._ earned them a deal with Domino, alongside a host of [shows](http://wearesuperorganism.com/) for the end of the year. As much as the quirkiness of the project as a whole has the potential to be slightly jarring at some stage, if you strip it all back you still have what is without doubt one of the best songs of the year. Check it out below.
